name: One on one Personalized Mentorship
description: Customized one-on-one mentoring tailored to your learning pace. Get direct guidance on any topic with flexible scheduling and focused problem-solving.

name: Full Stack Development Training
description: Master complete web development from frontend to backend. Learn modern frameworks, databases, and deployment with real-world projects.

name: AI Integration & Modern Web Technologies
description: Integrate artificial intelligence into your applications and explore cutting-edge web technologies. Learn OpenAI APIs, chatbots, and modern AI-powered features.

name: Video-Based Courses
description: Comprehensive video tutorials covering all major web development topics. Learn at your own pace with structured modules and practical examples.

name: Live Classes & Interactive Sessions
description: Join interactive live classes with real-time Q&A and hands-on coding sessions. Learn directly from experts and interact with peer learners.

name: Test Series & Skill Assessments
description: Practice with comprehensive test series and skill assessments. Evaluate your progress and identify areas for improvement with detailed feedback.

name: eBooks, Notes & PDFs
description: Access curated eBooks, comprehensive notes, and downloadable PDFs. Study materials covering theory, best practices, and quick reference guides.

name: Real-World Projects & Portfolio Building
description: Work on real-world projects from concept to deployment. Gain hands-on experience and build a professional portfolio that showcases your skills.

name: Career Guidance & Interview Preparation
description: Accelerate your tech career with expert guidance. Resume optimization, interview prep, portfolio building, and comprehensive career strategy.

name: Project Mentorship
description: Get personalized mentorship for your projects. Expert guidance from concept to completion with code reviews, best practices, and real-time feedback.
